data.title: Hong Kong to advance CDBC plans as HKMA charts regulatory future
data.description:
Hong Kong is setting its sights on the next phase of digital finance as the Hong Kong Monetary Authority (HKMA) advances its central bank digital currency (CBDC) agenda and strengthens data connectivity across the financial ecosystem. Eddie Yue, Chief Executive Officer (CEO), HKMA, shared these plans in his latest article, which also outlined the achievements […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/hong-kong-to-advance-cdbc-plans/

data.title: Has Mastercard accepted the inevitability of crypto? Spends $2B on tokenization platform
data.description:
Mastercard may soon make a significant investment to fully enter the crypto space. According to Reuters, the company is in advanced talks to acquire Zero Hash for roughly $1. 5 to $2 billion, a move that, if completed, would fold a regulated crypto-settlement network into one of the world’s largest payment processors
source: https://cryptoslate.com/has-mastercard-accepted-the-inevitability-of-crypto-spends-2b-on-tokenization-platform/

data.description:

data.title: Volkswagen earnings miss estimates by $1.52 billion thanks to Trump tariffs
data.description:
Volkswagen just reported a €1. 3 billion operating loss (that’s $1. 52 billion gone) in the third quarter of 2025. And that, ladies and gentlemen, is the real cost of two punches: Porsche’s failed EV gamble and Donald Trump’s tariffs still hammering the company like it’s 2019 all over again. According to Volkswagen’s earnings report, €4. 7 billion […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/volkswagen-earnings-miss-estimates/

data.title: Crypto’s Riot Platforms posts $180.2 million revenue in Q3 and nets $104.5 million profit
data.description:
Riot Platforms reported its financial results for the quarter ending September 30, 2025, and the numbers came in heavy. The company posted $180. 2 million in revenue, up from $84. 8 million in the same quarter last year. Riot also reported net income of $104. 5 million, equal to $0. 26 per diluted share, compared to a $154. 4 million […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/cryptos-riot-platforms-posts-180-2-million/

data.title: Amazon stock surges 13% after Q3 beat: revenue $180.2B up 13% YoY, EPS hits $1.95
data.description:
Amazon’s stock price jumped more than 13% in after-hours trading on Thursday after the company reported third-quarter results that beat every Wall Street projection. The company posted $180. 2 billion in revenue, up 13% year over year, and $1. 95 earnings per share, crushing the $1. 57 EPS analysts were expecting, and investors responded immediately. Amazon Web Services, […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/amazon-stock-surges-13-after-q3-beat/

data.title: Strategy’s Q3 profit drops to $2.8 billion as bitcoin rally fades, mNAV premium hits 18-month low
data.description:

data.title: Saylor’s Strategy snaps back to profit with $2.8 billion Q3 revenue on Bitcoin rally
data.description:
Strategy, trading on Nasdaq under several tickers including STRF, STRC, STRK, STRD, and MSTR, has finally snapped back into profit. The company, which calls itself the world’s first Bitcoin Treasury Company, posted net income of $2. 8 billion for the third quarter ending September 30. The profit came after a brutal 2024 when Strategy recorded steep […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/saylors-strategy-snaps-back-to-profit/

data.title: Ethereum (ETH) Flips Bitcoin (BTC) in Futures Activity on CME
data.description:
The number of unsettled contracts opened on the Ethereum derivatives market on CME has reached 53,183 as of October 28, outshining Bitcoin’s futures activities on the platform.
source: https://u.today/ethereum-eth-flips-bitcoin-btc-in-futures-activity-on-cme
